channel.title: Authenticate on Hugo Techdoc Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Authenticate on Hugo Techdoc Theme

item.title: Choose your sign-in solution
item.description: Determine which sign-in solution is right for you In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Links to original docs: - Okta deployment models - redirect vs.

item.title: Add the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model
item.description: Add the recommended sign-in solution: redirect model In Phase 1?: “Yes, content defined as a dynamic index” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: In phase 1 if “Setting up okta org policies” can be unified into one place for all (redirect and embedded) guides, we’ll have to add a specific set up guides for redirect and each of the embedded models.

item.title: Add a more customizable sign-in solution
item.description: Add a more customizable sign-in solution In Phase 1?: “Yes, content defined as a dynamic index” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Content Notes New or existing doc?: New doc - new content Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Dimensioned by: Not known Content type: Dynamic Index This document type is designed to automatically generate and display a list of child documents when a particular node in the navigation tree is selected.

item.title: Add a sign-in experience directly with Okta API
item.description: Add a sign-in experience directly with the Direct Authentication API In Phase 1?: “Yes, phase 1 version can be a very simple guide hub.” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, it’s “glue” documentation not related to the product help docs Group Notes Group description: This group contains all the Direct Auth integration guides. This section was created by pulling on the dimensions of the doc into separate guides in the new IA.

item.title: Eliminate duplicate factor challenges with AMR
item.description: Eliminate duplicate factor challenges with AMR In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - Update title Update Plant UML flowcharts Links to original docs: - Configure AMR claims mapping: https://developer.

item.title: Add a sign-in solution to an input constrained device (e.g. Apple TV)
item.description: Add a sign-in solution to an input constrained device (e.g. Apple TV) In Phase 1?: “Yes, but for phase 1 keep changes to existing doc as minimal as possible” In Phase 2?: TBD Related to help docs?: No, targetted towards developers Content Notes New or existing doc?: Existing doc: changes needed Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: - This guide contains reference endpoint information that needs to be stripped out of this guide and placed under the API reference if it doesn’t exist.

item.title: Add a browser sign-in solution for mobile devices

item.title: Share application key credentials across apps
